creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: color photo montage; interior view of a living room with blue floor, red stairs at center, and green couch with magenta pillow at right; shoulder of a figure in a blue shirt holding a black and white cat at left; person in orange shirt on stairs; woman with long orange hair and orange skin wearing a green bodice at right with another orange woman with short hair wearing an leopard printed sweater and bow tie and holding a green bowl of cereal behind first woman; black borders
signed: LLC in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 The Sound of Food
title: The Sound of Food
